About Me Projects

About Me

Recent graduate in Computer Science from University of Toronto St. George. I am interested in web development, computer network, and operating system. I hope to work in the realm of web/cloud and build a software being utilized in those field. Besides, I like to analyze data in my side as I've taken Machine Learning and math courses from U of T.

Technical Skills

Design

I am a capable front-end developer who can come up with innovative design using html/css. I also use bootstrap and frameworks to complement my design and for the better and modernized user experience of an application.

Code

Java has became my primary language due to my professional experience. I am also capable of coding in python, Javascript, C due to my keen interest in different technologies requiring different programming language knowledge

Tools

I am capable of using various tools for my development - mainly use vscode or IDE (ex. IntelliJ) appropriate to the framework being used. Furthermore, for quick configuration editing, I use terminal + vim combination for swift completion of my work

Featured Projects

stock-trading-platform

  • ReactJS Java Springboot Docker SQL

This is a full stack application built to manage trading stocks. The front-end is built using ReactJS and backend utilizes Springboot framework. The application is also containerized using docker. The image is uploaded to docker hub (https://hub.docker.com/)

Check it out

Daily Planner

  • HTML/CSS, JS

This is a website built for help manage daily schedules. Each day consist of 24 hours and you can schedule. A cicle is broken down into 24 pieces and you can fill specific part of your circle with a specific schedule and plan day ahead

Check it out

TextYourTile

  • ReactJS ExpressJS MongoDB

This is a MERN full stack web application with primary purpose to fill and decorate the canvas. The canvas consists of tiles and tiles can be filled with texts you write. To navigate around the canvas you can simpley click and drag. There is also, login and sign-up feature for personalization of a canvas

Check it out
